Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 122 not out, his highest T20I score
India scored 212/2, their highest total against Afghanistan in T20Is
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first meeting between India and Afghanistan in the Super Four stage of the T20 Asia Cup
Others: India won the match by 101 runs, securing their place in the final
